review: an excellent edition to the game the new races are fun and well made and the necromancer class and shadowborn spheres add a nice touch of evil the new diplomacy system with the neutral cities is nicely improved and the new race relation system is fantastic i would definitely recommend this dlc to anyone who owns the original game

review: so here are the pros and cons to this expansion  pros everything cons none   enough said  this is a dlc worthy of maybe even 25 thats how much content that packed into this expansion this isnt like a cod expansion or a civ expansion with a few things and it costs 20 this expansion adds 2 new races a new class 2 new subclasses new units for every faction this expansion is fantastic and adds plenty of replayability to an already fantastic game   1010
game_title: Age of Wonders III - Eternal Lords

review: for 20 you get   improvements to the original campaigns  new strategic map treasure sites  a huge improvement to the racial system with race command   a new class and new heroes that are very customizable for all other classes to hire  a new campaign with multiple endings  two new races with interesting interplay  a really interesting unit buff ghoul that can impact all nonmachine nonundead nonsummon units  this is more of an expansion than a once and done dlc packet
